name: topic-monitor
description: Monitor topics and keywords across web sources. Set up keyword watches, track mentions, and get alerts when new content matches your topics.
author: claw2agent

toolDefinition.name: topic_monitor
toolDefinition.description: Monitor topics and keywords. Create keyword watches, check for new mentions, manage alerts, and analyze topic trends.

action.description: watch (add topic), unwatch (remove), list (show all watches), check (scan for new mentions), matches (view stored matches), stats (topic statistics)

keywords.description: Keywords to monitor for this topic

content.description: Content to scan for matches (for check action)

source.description: Source label for the content being checked
